mapper.select: SELECT a.LESSON_NUM, a.LESSON_TITLE, b.TIPER_IMG, b.TIPER_CODE, b.TIPER_USER_ID, b.TIPER_ADDR, c.USER_NAME, c.USER_EMAIL, a.LESSON_CATE, a.LESSON_DATE, b.TIPER_INFO, a.LESSON_INFO FROM LESSON a INNER JOIN TIPER b ON a.LESSON_TIPER_CODE=b.TIPER_CODE INNER JOIN USERS c ON b.TIPER_USER_ID=c.USER_ID WHERE LESSON_NUM=#{lesson_num};

SELECT a.LESSON_NUM, a.LESSON_TITLE, b.TIPER_ADDR, c.USER_NAME FROM LESSON a INNER JOIN TIPER b ON a.LESSON_TIPER_CODE=b.TIPER_CODE INNER JOIN USERS c ON b.TIPER_USER_ID=c.USER_ID ORDER BY LESSON_NUM desc;
